descriptionHtml:
This is my personal project to make tattoos for my own character, i am in huge love with tattoed girls. 
Just decided to share this with you and if i get enought likes maybe i could do some more mods and post it here. My mod is classic one, means in package you get dds files to replace originals, i used real girls body here. If you dont like that body type i am not making mods for any other just avoid this mod if you dont like it. All of this is made in gimp soo you can do your own tattoos if you dont like mine. If i get some like maybe il post some gimp dds tutorial and do mods by request but for now this is it. Enjoy guys... :D

UPDATE! version b&w 0.9 is here, hope you like it
Credits:
all tnx to Zonzai for real girls body texture and  Seren for face normal maps
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?
author: Dreivor
